website_summaries.verdict: Crafted from durable materials, this charming stand will assist your family's cooking needs for years to come.
pros: Holds large cookbooks and smaller cookbooks alike
The ball and chain is heavier than most customers expected, effectively holding down pages
Buyers rave over the vintage design of this product
cons: A little big for some buyers
Product looks more turquoise in person than was shown in picture

customer_reviews.title: Looks so beautiful in our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this metal cookbook stand for my new cookbook that I got for mother’s day. It’s even more beautiful in person. It’s very sturdy and helps keep the pages open of my cookbooks. It has a chain with a weighted ball on the left and right sides,for you to place on top of the pages you want to keep open of your book. I highly recommend this cookbook stand! It’s exactly the color pictured here. Would be a great birthday gift for someone,or housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.author: RLH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Looks great on my butcher block island! Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful color and holds up beautifully to some of our ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cookbook holder for our wedding guest book and to later be used in our kitchen. It's a beautiful color and holds up beautifully to some of our larger, heavier cookbooks. Would certainly recommend this to anyone who is looking for an elegant, rustic cookbook holder.
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy enough for every book I've tried so far... Also just cute to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Lovely & Vintage
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. I was not sure if I would ...since it's green. It's a very pretty item, looks great on my kitchen counter. I used it tonight to hold a recipe card while making diner. Works...item is as described. Fits right into my "farm house" ...shabby chic kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Flores

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: This item came on time and was in perfect condition. It is absolutely beautiful and looks great in my kitchen. The ball and chain set for keeping the pages down is heavier than I expected and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Not super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, color is slightly lighter than picture. Not super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool vintage look.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty Cook Book holder. Works great. The page holders work really well. Folds up to store if you need to, but we leave ours out on the counter and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Decorative Cookbook Holder
customer_reviews.text: I use this more as a decorative but it functions well as a cookbook holder since it has the page place holders. Very nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: KCinAZ

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that it isn't the most sturdy -- however
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Holds a large cook book quite well. My only complaint is that it isn't the most sturdy -- however, it stays upright just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty enough to leave out on my counter. I use it almost every day. Washes nicely, sturdy and I love the fact the it has nice heavy weights to keep the pages still.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: It was just as stated!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted . Beautiful color and well packaged. It’s a gift so I know it will be loved. It was exactly as described! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JEAN KLEIN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy beautiful cookbook stand
customer_reviews.text: super cute and holds my cookbooks fantastically! Makes cooking so much easier very sturdy and don't have to keep it against the wall to stay sturdy. Can do so on its own. It is more of a mint green in my opinion but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Keliann Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my kitchen. Sturdy enough to support a large book or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Brown

customer_reviews.title: It holds my big cookbook really well
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large cookbook of all family recipes and needed a deep holder for it. This one is a great size and color for my kitchen. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayren

customer_reviews.title: Fall Baking
customer_reviews.text: Great for our fall baking. It gives us more counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Parsneau

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the width does not work for thicker books.
customer_reviews.author: CatahoulaMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my counter!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and color. Extremely cute and functional. I use it every night!
customer_reviews.author: lisa thompson

customer_reviews.title: Charming display
customer_reviews.text: Requires a bit of depth to the surface it is placed on, but it was just the color and antiqued look I was going for to tie into the room
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and fits perfectly with the decor in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Well made book holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this book holder, well made and looks great sitting on my bench. Postage was super quick, thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy. The only thing I would mention is ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Pretty sturdy. The only thing I would mention is that it's "bluer" than what the picture looks like. My friend loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my country kitchen. Love it. Nice and heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: OMM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it works great! Don't know how I lived without a recipe stand before.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little bluer than what if shows, but loved it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I gave it as a gift and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It is really beautiful and my mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mom. It is really beautiful and my mom loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! The back stand was crooked but it doesn't effect it. Very sturdy! I'm getting my mom one for mother's day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It holds most cookbooks comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. It holds most cookbooks comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Cookbooks love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a marvellous cookbook holder. Looks gorgeous in the kitchen, is suitably strong for holding the largest of cookbooks, and you can attach magnetic timers and other acessories to it as it is metal. Easy to clean. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but stand a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The product looks just like it does in the picture and the front side is fine - our only complaint is that the stand at the rear is a little flimsy....
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Evans

customer_reviews.title: Best part is
customer_reviews.text: Its heavy duty, and I get compliments on it. Best part is, my husband never complained!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cookbook holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a gift and when I opened it to re wrap I fell in love! Sturdy, adorable, rustic, classy, just perfect. She says its perfect and holds the pages perfectly. I finally bought myself one! Can't wait for it to arrive!
customer_reviews.author: Cici Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  color is blue
customer_reviews.text: It's certainly not the color in the picture. It is stated as "aqua" but that is a generic term for green blue or blue green. I was hoping it was the color of the picture. It stands almost upright, would have looked a picture of the stand side view. It takes a lot of space but it holds my 1000 page cookbook. I purchased it to also hold my college books.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dusenberry

customer_reviews.title: excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook stand is even more beautiful in person than I expected. The colors are a gorgeous vintage teal/bronze and it's large and sturdy. It looks wonderful on my counter and holds my cookbooks and even paper recipes very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rooke

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, sturdy & well made metal stand. So beautiful & just what I needed to elevate my cookbook to a comfortable height for me to read while cooking. And it’s a space saver as I need as much counter space as I can get in my small kitchen. Btw, mine is green as pictured on Amazon. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice in my kitchen. Colors and style matches perfectly my rustic style decoration. I was looking for a stand to avoid getting my cookbooks dirty while cooking. This one does the job!
customer_reviews.author: VAlva

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute book display!
customer_reviews.text: Its so cute and so far has held all the books I have placed on it while I cook. Very delicate looking chains but they have held up well. Sits on my counter in a corner so I don't move it around too much. Just pull it forward when needed and then tuck it back away. Its perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: CTindall

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and holds a book great
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and holds a book great. My complaint is that the stand collapses easily if u move it so while its a nice feature that it can fold flat, not so nice if folds ip and falls on the counter if you bump or move it. Wish it had some feature to help keep it open
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pratt

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again - looks very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it at all. Its too big, the balls seem to look out of place. If you are using the balls to keep the pages down why do you need the extra lip in the front? It makes it really difficult to turn pages especially while using the ball. Not painted nicely. Looks cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a "used" product. It came in perfect condition for almost half the cost. Very pretty and functional. I use it in the kitchen for large cook books also my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but bigger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Great, but bigger than I thought it would be, so it doesn't fit where I planned. However, I will use it somewhere else. I like the weighted chain to hold pages in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful!! It holds a cook book and my IPad . I looked at others but I'm so glad that I picked this one. ~Linda
customer_reviews.author: R. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: but I still love it. It is going to look great in ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little more turquoise than I expected, but I still love it. It is going to look great in my remodeled, French Country kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Elbie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very sturdy and cute. Love the chains that hold it open.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Very rustic/farmhouse
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal stand that adds a green vintage feel to the kitchen. Love the weights to hold the pages open.
customer_reviews.author: S. MCKEON

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookbook holder
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cookbook stand and this is perfect. It can hold a bigger book so I can see both pages. And the color is my pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So chic!
customer_reviews.text: I asked for stand to hold my cookbooks. I never imagined one like this. I love it! It goes well with our vintage chic style of kitchen. I like displaying my cookbooks now! Compliments our kitchen and home!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! A beautiful cookbook stand that fits well in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shively

customer_reviews.title: It’s just like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to myself! I live it! Sturdy and beautiful a wonderful accent piece for your kitchen also a great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL! I wasn't sure what to expect when I bought this as a Christmas gift -- fits perfect in my Mom and Dad's rustic home. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R Rice

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love. The balls on the ends of the chains ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. The balls on the ends of the chains are heavy and sturdy, they keep the pages open on even my largest cook book.
customer_reviews.author: V. Crowther

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Color
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to be of good quality but is not the color listed. It’s a light blue rather than aqua. Product is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mom has already tried to steal this little beauty from me. Just gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Oh so pretty! I get tons of compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Oh so pretty! I get tons of compliments on it. It's not super heavy. It holds even large cookbooks with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Fgoodland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Well made. Perfect gift for my Mom for Christmas 😍
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: chains are perfect for holding down the page
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly, fairly heavy, chains are perfect for holding down the page, looks beautiful in person. great buy, was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Laci J. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this--sitting out on my counter now-very pretty and I use it everyday! It's heavy duty and just a lovely piece of decor.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: ... was a bit bigger than I anticipated I absolutely love it! I use it to hold work on ...
customer_reviews.text: While this was a bit bigger than I anticipated I absolutely love it! I use it to hold work on my desk like a document holder. Working with a ton of papers this is just the perfect size. The color is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Warren Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just great quality here, my wife loves it and its built very well, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when I ordered this, as items can often appear different in pictures than in real life. However, when it arrived, I was very impressed! It's beautiful! It doesn't take up much space on the countertop, and looks great even without a book on it. I can't wait until more are in stock so I can order one for my mom and sister. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tara Rae

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Unique
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter in person! Got this for my sister as a housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: My friend loved this!!!!!!  And she's hard to please.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my friend and she absolutely loved it! She is hard to please because she can buy herself almost anything. And she absolutely loves this! It's beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I love this as a holder for my digital scrapbooks. Well made and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook holder! It is shabby and sheek and the weight balls hold your pages in place!! I would recommend this to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: holds my heavy cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute stand in my eclectic kitchen. It hold even my heavier cookbooks. It's gotten some splatter from cooking mishaps and cleans pretty easily with a wipe down. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bj_on_amazon

customer_reviews.title: book holder
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was expecting. I'm not too fond of the color. Might like alot better if it where a different color.
customer_reviews.author: japjfledd

product_meta.title: Creative Co-Op Metal Cookbook Holder, Blue
product_meta.description: At Creative Co-Op, passion is at the heart of all we do - passion for product, passion for quality, and passion for customer success. It is this passion that grew a company founded only 12 years ago into the dynamic, trend-setter that it is today. This passion ensures we will continue to lead the industry for years to come. At our core, we live and breathe product. Our design team travels the world for inspiration, taking the best elements of their experience and translating them into a creative, unique assortment that caters to a broad variety of tastes. Whether you're a small boutique or a larger furniture store, our product line has something for you - and at price points that work. We strive to create product of the highest quality standard, and go to great lengths to ensure that you'll be proud to sell our merchandise. Both abroad and in the US, we adhere to strict quality control measures, but should you ever encounter an issue, we will do everything possible to rectify the situation as quickly as possible. Our customer service team strives for continual improvement, with a single goal - to be the best in the industry.
feature_bullets: Metal with an antiqued painted finish
